## reduceAsArray() function

Returns an array of instances. For HasMany relation usage.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function reduceAsArray<T>(acc: T[] | undefined, it: T): T[];
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  acc | T\[\] \| undefined |  |
|  it | T |  |

**Returns:**

T\[\]
